@deans1243 wrote:

alright im trying to add this in my yell command so when my head admin or co-owner it will say (head admin) and(co-owner)
here is the code in my yell

}else if (c.playerName == deathkeep){ c2.sendMessage("[@gre@Co-Owner@bla@]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerName == jester){ c2.sendMessage("[@red@Head Admin@red@]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

that should work right?
